subject: Re: suite() method handling
msgSnippet: The behaviour you are seeing is correct. -dv ... iterated ... be
messageBody:
The behaviour you are seeing is correct.
-dv
--- In junit@y..., "Boris_Burtin" <boris_burtin@y...> wrote:
> I noticed something that looks like an inconsistency with the way
> that the suite() method gets handled. BaseTestRunner is the thing
> that looks for the existence of a suite() method in a test. If you
> create a TestSuite and pass a class that has a suite() method, the
> suite() method is ignored and all the textXXX() methods are
iterated
> to generate the suite.
>
> Is this intentional behavior? I would think that TestSuite would
be
> the thing that looks for a suite() method.
>
> Boris
